channel.title: Facebook on blog.daruyanagi.jp
channel.description: Recent content in Facebook on blog.daruyanagi.jp

item.title: Facebook 1.3.0.9
item.description: br/> ### Facebook 1.2.0.12 → 1.3.0.9 br/> > New features: Turn off chat Narrower margins for snap view to show more content Create/join/leave groups Black and white high contrast modes Edit privacy when editing posts Double-tap to zoom photos full res Accessibility enhancements Bugfixes Note: Windows 8.1 is required to run this app. #### Turn off chat ャットのコンタクトリスト下

item.title: Surface RT
item.description: indows 8（Windows RT を含む）では、Microsoft アカウントに Facebook を紐づけている場合、Facebook の友だちの誕生日が「カレンダー」アプ
